verses.roman:
kintu āji eka muñi 'svapna' dekhinu
sei svapna parateka tomā āsi' pāinu

synonyms: kintu—but; āji—today; eka—one; muñi—I; svapna—dream; dekhinu—saw; sei svapna—that dream; parateka—according to; tomā—You; āsi'-coming; pāinu—I have gotten.
translation: "Today I have had a dream, and according to that dream I have come here and found You."
